[Source]

    # File lib/active_merchant/lib/validateable.rb, line 62
62:       def full_messages
63:         result = []
64: 
65:         self.each do |key, messages| 
66:           if key == :base
67:             result << "#{messages.first}"
68:           else
69:             result << "#{key.to_s.humanize} #{messages.first}"
70:           end
71:         end
72: 
73:         result
74:       end
on(field)

returns a specific fields error message. if more than one error is available we will only return the first. If no error is available we return an empty string

[Source]

47:       end
